FlanaApis
=========

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/github/license/AlberLC/flanaapis?style=flat
    :target: https://github.com/AlberLC/flanaapis/blob/main/LICENSE
    :alt: License

Flanagan's apis.

Installation
------------

Python 3.10 or higher is required.

.. code-block:: python

    pip install flanaapis
